DOC.detailed_description: Colorectal cancer ( CRC ) second commonest cancer Hong Kong , tend increase . Screening colorectal cancer reduce cancer incidence mortality detect early lesion . However , best interval follow colonoscopy , particularly normal baseline colonoscopy , remain largely unknown . This study aim determine prevalence colonic neoplasm average-risk patient previously undergone screen colonoscopy optimal time interval re-screening .
